name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GOAT - AI Summarizer (The fastest way to research)✨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GOAT AI ✨: One-click Summaries of articles, pdfs, Youtube videos, and more

Save time by quickly understanding the key points of any content with GOAT AI. 
With 1-click, get a concise summary right on the page you're viewing.

"It’s a must-have for anyone who values their time. With GOAT, I can go through a dozen articles in the time it used to take to read one. It lets me stay informed across all my interests without feeling overwhelmed.”
-Mike P

✍️ "It's like SparkNotes for the internet"

*NEW* 
All summaries are now saved in your dashboard at https://www.goat-labs.com/summarizer and can be shared with friends! 

Why Use GOAT AI?
✔️ Drive better decisions consistently
✔️ Works on any website or YouTube video
✔️ Quickly grasp the main ideas without reading or watching the whole thing
✔️ Summaries include:
    - TL;DR: A brief overview (”too long, didn’t read”)
    - Background: Key context
    - Key Points: Main takeaways
    - Special Insights: Notable info
    - Why It Matters: Explained importance

⌛ Save Time: Roughly ~300 hours per year on average

GOAT is for everyone, but it's even more effective for:
- Busy professionals needing quick updates
- Students looking to simplify study materials
- Productivity enthusiasts aiming to save time

How It Works:
1. Install the GOAT AI Chrome extension
2. Click the GOAT AI icon while viewing an article or video
3. A summary sidebar will appear on the page

Plans:
- Free: Up to 10 summaries a month
- Unlimited: $14.99 per month for unlimited access

Testimonials:
“GOAT has been a lifesaver for quick research. I get summaries with key points and context, which means I don’t have to sift through endless pages to get the info I need. It’s invaluable for preparing for meetings and keeping up with trends.”
-Linda

“Its like having a personal study assistant. It breaks down articles and books into clear summaries that help me focus on what matters most. I feel more prepared and engaged in my classes because I’m no longer overwhelmed by all the reading.”
-Sarah

Make content easier to understand—try GOAT AI today!
